name: The Last Knight (EthanChampy, madmanrex, lhoward, JJJLawton)
name_original: The Last Knight (EthanChampy, madmanrex, lhoward, JJJLawton)
description:
Play as a knight fighting through the apocalypse! Defeat the four horsemen in this small indie adventure!

A small game made by a group of student developers as an early project!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Attack - J

Jump - Space

Interact - W

Created by Ethan Champion, Luke Howard, Josh Lawton and Max Boyes
